Title: Export Session (Word + Playlist)
Description:
As a facilitator, I want to export the session to a Word document and text playlist, so that I can print or manually transfer it to Apple Music.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Export a DOCX file with table: Exercise name, Vivencia Line, Selected Song.
- Export a .txt or .csv with the ordered song filenames for easy Apple Music manual playlist creation.

Title: Load LSB Catalogue
Description:
As a facilitator, I want the app to contain the official LSB catalogue from a structured LSB Excel workbook,
so that I can browse official exercises and access their associated songs and phase information. 

Acceptance Criteria:
  • LSB Excel workbook data is persistently stored into the app
  • The 4 spreadsheets: Musics, Exercises-to-Musics, Exercises, Exercise-Categories are structured in a relational database for in-app consumption

Title: Select and Sequence Exercises via UI
Description:
As a facilitator,

I want to build a session by selecting exercises from the LSB catalogue and sequencing them,
So that I can design my class structure directly in the app without using external files.
Acceptance Criteria:
Acceptance Criteria:

  • The app displays exercises filtered by user-selected phase (1–5 or all).

  • User can select an exercise and add it to the session with one click.

  • Exercises are added as tuples: (exercise code + name, music = blank by default).

  • Session list supports dynamic reordering of exercises.

  • Sequence numbers adjust automatically to reflect current order.

Title: Select and Preview Song per Exercise
Description:
As a facilitator, I want to preview and assign one song per exercise from a pre-filtered list, so that I can ensure musical flow and appropriateness before exporting the session.

Acceptance Criteria:
- When an exercise is added to a session, show associated songs.
- Let user click to play audio inline from local files.
- Let user assign a selected song to that exercise.
- Final session list includes each exercise with chosen song.

Title: Save and Load Past Sessions
Description:
As a facilitator, I want to save my built session and reload it later, so that I can avoid rebuilding sessions from scratch and maintain a reusable archive.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Save current session to structured local file (JSON/CSV).
- Display list of past sessions in a dropdown.
- Load and restore session details into the UI.

Title: Add Metadata and Persist Session
Description:
As a facilitator,
I want to name and tag the session and save it with a unique ID,
So that I can retrieve and reuse past sessions later.

Acceptance Criteria:

  • User can enter session name, description, and tags (#tag format).

  • Date field is prefilled with today’s date but editable.

  • App generates a unique session ID (e.g., UUID or timestamp-based).

  • Session data is saved to a local SQLite DB or JSON file.

  • The data includes all exercises (in order) and placeholder for music selections.
